name: HTMLCanvasElement
description: The HTMLCanvasElement interface provides properties and methods for manipulating the layout and presentation of canvas elements. The HTMLCanvasElement interface also inherits the properties and methods of the HTMLElement interface.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLCanvasElement' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.

refs.name: Media Capture from DOM Elements
refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLCanvasElement' in the 'Media Capture from DOM Elements' specification.
